displayName.text: Orit Markowitz, MD; Board-Certified Dermatologist at Markowitz Medical

authorAttributions.displayName: Orit Markowitz, MD; Board-Certified Dermatologist at Markowitz Medical
Orit Markowitz, MD; Board-Certified Dermatologist at Markowitz Medical

adrFormatAddress: 1150 5th Ave # 1a, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Dr Markowitz successfully treated a BCC on my forehead with a non ablative laser.  It was previously treated by another dermatologist but came back.  Dr Markowitz informed me at my last visit yesterday that it looked great and that there was nothing to laser.  Note that you need to be consistent and see her once a month.  Do not skip your appointments.  I made that mistake and it set my treatment back resulting in the lesion coming back.  I had four treatments.  The fourth treatment was aggressive and it took about two weeks for the area to look better.  I hope to have my final follow up next month.  I highly recommend Dr Markowitz.  She is compassionate and most importantly she does not believe in cutting unless it is necessary.  Most dermatologists would not hesitate to carve you up.  I did a lot of research on non surgical treatment options before I found Dr Markowitz and I am glad that I found her.  I live outside of the NYC area and take Amtrak and a bus to her office.  Definitely worth the trip.  Thank you again for treating me.

originalText.text: I visited Dr. Markowitz for the first time a few weeks ago to receive softwave skin tightening treatment. From the minute I walked in, the staff was very nice and attentive. They explained the procedure to me and made me feel super comfortable. When I met with Dr. Markowitz she was very cheerful and made me less nervous, she is truly a professional. I started seeing my results within two weeks and have received so many compliments, my skin looks softer and brighter. I will definitely be visiting Dr. Markowitz again.

originalText.text: Super impressed with Dr. Markowitz. I flew to NYC from Wyoming to get non-invasive laser treatment for my basal cell carcinoma. I had no idea what to expect and knew I was taking a big risk in seeing a doctor I had never met for a new procedure I had never done. Dr. Markowitz’s bed side manner was warm, professional, and honest. She not only answered my questions but was supportive and patient in explaining my particular treatment plan and helped me process my options. I left her office trusting her thorough assessment and thoughtful recommendations.

I left her office trusting her thorough assessment and thoughtful recommendations.

originalText.text: Having known Dr. Markowitz since high school, I always thought she had the traits to make an excellent doctor: competent, compassionate, and personable.  Not only book smart, she also has the emotional intelligence to partner with her patients and help them confront difficult diagnoses. During my annual cancer screening, I have found her to be thorough with meticulous attention to detail.  Whether you see Dr. Markowitz for medical or cosmetic issues, you can be confident in her great problem solving abilities to determine the best course of action.

originalText.text:
I'll start with the positives, the team here is so nice and welcoming, and the app they use is easy to navigate so you have your medical info on you all the time. Unfortunately on the whole I had a bad experience seeing Dr. Markowitz from April to Sept 2022.

I'm sure Dr. Markowitz is a good cosmetic dermatologist, but I would never recommend her to somebody with a skin condition. For the whole six months, I insisted that I had psoriasis. Dr. Markowitz disregarded the skin biopsy I had previously which confirmed this, and instead she kept insisting it was a fungus. The treatments did not work, my condition worsened, and I was in pain and discomfort for months. I found another dr who specialized in skin conditions and she immediately confirmed it was psoriasis. In the time I spent being ignored by Dr. Marowitz, my condition has caused permanent damage. I'm honestly shocked the rating here is so high, but maybe I just shouldn't have come here for something non-cosmetic.
